Class MatrixGraph

java.lang.Object
AbstractGraph
MatrixGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph
public class MatrixGraph
extends AbstractGraph
A MatrixGraph is an implementation of the Graph abstract class that uses an array to represent the edges.

  • Nested Class Summary

    private class  MatrixGraph.Iter
    An iterator to the edges.

      public Edge getEdge​(int source, int dest)

      dest - - The destination
